import React from 'react'; import './About.css'; const AboutUs = () => { return (

About Us

Our Story

Our Founder - Mohammad Khairulla Rafiulla Ansari (aka KR)

Mohammad Khairulla Rafiulla Ansari , the visionary founder of KR Enterprises, established the company with a mission to bridge the talent gap across borders. With over two decades of experience in international recruitment and talent management, John has been a driving force in connecting businesses with top-tier professionals worldwide. His deep understanding of the global job market, coupled with a passion for helping individuals find their dream careers, has positioned KR Enterprises as a leader in the recruitment industry.

Our Mission

At Hops & Barley, our mission is clear: to brew exceptional, locally inspired beers that celebrate the unique character of our town. We're committed to using the finest, locally sourced ingredients and time-honored brewing techniques to create brews that are as distinctive as they are delicious. Beyond our passion for brewing, we aim to be a welcoming hub for beer enthusiasts, creating a space for connection, conversation, and community. Our mission is to share the joy of craft brewing, one pint at a time, as we raise our glasses to the incredible people who make this place so special.

Our Philosophy

At Hops & Barley, our philosophy is rooted in tradition, craftsmanship, and community. We believe in the power of local flavors and the artistry of brewing. Our commitment is to create beers with integrity, using the finest ingredients and age-old techniques to craft brews that reflect the unique character of our town. We strive to build a community around our brewery, where every pint is a testament to our dedication and passion for the craft.

); }; export default AboutUs;
